price: Ndio tunawahimizia kheri? Lakini wenyewe hawatambui.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Ndio basi Sisi tumekuwa radhi nao, na kheri zikawamiminikia mbio mbio na kwa wingi? Hao ni kama wanyama, hawatambui, kwa kuwa hawazitumii akili zao. Mimi si radhi nao. Na hizi neema ni kuwapururia tu, kuwapa muda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
